subject: Re: Order #SSN6223 confirmed
description_text:
Hi Simsonn

Can you please add the horizontal supports for VAM haptics brake +
accelerator?

I just realised now they are an upgrade and didn't add them to the order.

I'll pay them separately, is ir possible?

Please let me know.

Best regards,

Eduardo Vasconcelos

conversations.body_text: Hi Eduardo Vasconcelos,  ​Don't worry, we will replace it for you free of charge.

You're the best!!!

Thank you so much!

Best regards



A segunda, 19/01/2026, 03:53, service@simsonn.com

Hi Eduardo Vasconcelos,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.Wish you a pleasant day.
